author: @TIMESNOW
title: Delhi Weather: Rain, Strong Winds And Thunderstorms Likely Today; Yellow Alert In Place
text:
Delhi Weather: Rain, Strong Winds And Thunderstorms Likely Today; Yellow Alert In Place
Delhi-NCR residents woke up to pleasant weather with rain and thunderstorms in the forecast. Moreover, a yellow alert remains in place till May 9.
Delhi on yellow alert today: See IMD forecast
Delhi-NCR Weather: Residents woke up to pleasant weather today amid the India Meteorological Department's (IMD) forecast of rain with thunderstorms, with temperatures expected to reach a maximum of around 38 degrees Celsius and a minimum of 25 degrees Celsius.
Heavy showers and hailstorms in parts of the NCR on Wednesday brought much-needed relief from the heat but also disrupted daily life. Amid continuing thunderstorm activity, the weather department has extended a yellow alert for
Delhitill May 9.See Weekly Forecast
May 9:Max: 34–36 degrees Celsius | Min: 25–27 degrees Celsius
Cloudy skies with light rain, thunder, and gusty winds peaking at 50 kmph. No heat wave.
May 10:
Max: 35–37 degrees Celsius | Min: 26–28 degrees Celsius
Partly cloudy with very light rain and occasional gusts up to 30 kmph.
May 11:
Max: 36–38 degrees Celsius | Min: 26–28 degrees Celsius
Partly cloudy skies with moderate winds (10–20 kmph) occasionally gusting to 30 kmph.
May 12:
Max: 37–39 degrees Celsius | Min: 27–29 degrees Celsius
Partly cloudy with strong northwesterly winds (15–25 kmph), gusting to 35 kmph.
May 13:
Max: 36–38 degrees Celsius | Min: 27–29 degrees Celsius
Partly cloudy with sustained westerly winds (15–25 kmph). No heat wave conditions expected.
Moreover, around 140 flights to and from the Delhi airport were cancelled by various airlines including foreign carriers on Wednesday in the wake of the armed forces carrying out missile strikes on terror targets in Pakistan. As per a PTI report, 65 arrivals and 66 departures were cancelled. Besides, 2 international departures and 2 international arrivals were cancelled during the day. Also, 4 international departures, including a flight of American Airlines, were cancelled since 12 am.
